description:
Navigate to the website and login using following credentials:
username: test_user_name
password: test_password 

On the home page, verify the following
1. banner image loads correctly.
2. "Just In" section displays 4 products
3. Category callouts are present in the navigation section: Clothes, Shoes, Accessories
4. Verify "Offers" section is displayed.
5. Verify that all navigation links (just in, clothes, shoes, accessories, offers) in the header work correctly.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to http://localhost:3005
Verify that the banner image on the home page loads correctly
Check that the 'Just In' section displays exactly 4 products
Ensure the navigation section contains category callouts labeled 'Clothes', 'Shoes', and 'Accessories'
Confirm that the 'Offers' section is displayed on the home page
Interact with each header navigation link ('Just In', 'Clothes', 'Shoes', 'Accessories', 'Offers') to verify they navigate correctly
Take a screenshot to capture the completed state of the home page

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Verify homepage banner, product count, and navigation

description:
Navigate to the website and use the following credentials to login.
username: test_user_name
password: test_password


Make sure the user lands on the home page. 
Navigate to shoes sub-menu.

Then click on "The Store" home logo and verify that user cames back to the home page.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the target website at http://localhost:3005.
Verify that the home page is displayed with the expected banner image.
Locate and select the shoes sub-menu from the navigation options on the site.
Click on the 'The Store' home logo to initiate a return to the home page.
Verify that the user is redirected back to the home page after clicking the logo.
Take a screenshot of the home page to confirm the final state.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Navigate website and verify home page navigation

description:
Login to the websiste using the following credentialss
username: test_user_name
password: test_password

Make sure the homepage loads, and user is able to click on "cart" and see an empty cart.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the target URL 'http://localhost:3005'.
Verify that the homepage loads by checking that the banner image is visible.
Click on the Cart option on the homepage.
Verify that the cart is empty by checking that no items are displayed.
Take a screenshot of the completed task to confirm the empty cart view.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Verify homepage loads and cart is empty

description:
One user land on the home page, go to shoes category, and use the following filters:
Black shoes for Men with max prices upto $100
Verify that the first product that shows up is of color black, and it is priced for less than $100

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to http://localhost:3005 to access the home page.
Confirm that the home page displays the banner image.
Select the shoes category from the navigation menu.
Apply the filter for the color black in the product filtering options.
Apply the filter for men products so only men's shoes are displayed.
Set the maximum price filter to $100 to limit the product listings.
Verify that the first product displayed is of color black.
Verify that the price of the first product is less than $100.
Capture a screenshot as a final confirmation of the test results.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Navigate shoes category, filter products, verify details
